original_title: CID calls for report over officers involved in Mahara Prison shooting
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Criminal Investigation Department has informed the Department of Prisons to submit a report regarding the officers involved in the shooting that took place at the Mahara Prison.
A senior officer of the CID says the Attorney General has issued orders to arrest the relevant officers.
The officer says further investigations will be carried out based on the directives of the Inspector General of Police.
In 2020, 11 prisoners were killed in a shooting within the Mahara Prison during a protest staged by the inmates, based on several demands.
Turkey reports that the alleged Islamic State leader Qurayshi has died in Syria
The Super Mario Bros. Movie pass $1 billion at the global box office
Vatican engaging in a peace mission to Russia and Ukraine – Pope
